description: A fast wicking and durable merino bike short liner made for epic day rides, or those who want extra comfort. High air permeability merino mesh wicks moisture and dries in a flash. Merino Shift Stretch fabric is fast wicking and durable, with added lycra for stretch.
name: Mons Royale Epic Merino Shift Bike Short Liner - Mens

specs.value: Merino Shift Stretch - 50% Merino Wool, 33% Recycled Polyester, 12% Nylon, 5% Elastane - 180gsm
